description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik-based web application, including request handling, styling, and a navigational header.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Creates a Qwik component that encapsulates the layout rendering.

methods.name: useStyles$
methods.description: Applies imported CSS styles to the component.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests for the route, setting cache control headers asynchronously.
